titleStmt.title: By the Auditor-General of the revenues of Scotland whereas upon application made unto the right honourable his highness council in Scotland, for the government thereof, by the magistrates and Council of Edinburgh, concerning some abuse, disproportion and difference lately discovered to have been from the 24 of February to the 28 day of April last ...
titleStmt.author: Auditor General for Scotland.
